2\. Overview

Starting job: [[PC0066454]]

  


Incident Menu

New Incident

All Incidents

My Incidents

  


Incident Screen

Incident Section:

  * Title
  * Auto-generated ID -- This ID can easily be referenced from other documents as a hyperlink (e.g. [[IN0024]]
  * Status
  * Status Summary
  * Priority -- priority list
  * Assignee - assignee for incident
  * Due Date 
  * Additional Assignees - multi select list
  * Type -- user-configurable list of options (e.g. Client Interaction, Scheduling)
  * Workflow
  * Contact
  * Tags -- interface for adding multiple tags to an incident (e.g. )
  * Organization
  * Billable - checkbox
  * Billing Details - child detail button
  * Start - button
  * Open Time Card - link
  * Archive Notes - displays a history memo where discussions and other notes can be archived once they are resolved
  * Memo - memo for the incident contents
  * Generate PDF - link
  * Export to Word - link



  


Related Incident Section:

[ ] Parent Incident

[ ] New Child - link

  


Linking fields:

  * Contact -- optional contact
  * Organization -- will automatically be set with contact organization if contact is specified.



  


Content fields:

  * Contents - 
  * History button -- displays a history memo where discussions and other notes can be archived once they are resolved



  


Footer fields:

  * Created:
  * Originated - Origination date
  * Last Modified
  * Closed - date incident was closed. The incidents can only be closed by users with permission to "Close Incidents"
  * Modification History link 
  * Send Email - link



  


  


Reports

All Incidents - Multi-pane report with Views. Shows Incidents as per selected views in the main pane. The report let us search by text, Assignee, Type, Tags, Workflow, Origination date, status and past number of days.

Views:

Open Incidents by Status (grouped by Status)

Open Incidents by Priority (grouped by Priority)

Open Incidents by Assignee (grouped by Assignee)

Open Incidents by Type (grouped by Type)

Open Incidents by Due Date (grouped by Due Date)

Open Incidents by Workflow (grouped by Workflow)

Recent Unread Incidents (grouped by the last modification dates of the incidents)

Recent Incidents (grouped by the last modification dates of the incidents)

All Incidents (grouped by the status and then closed)

Closed Incidents (grouped by the closing dates of the incidents)

  


My Incidents - shows incidents of contact user
